data.message: I love the new like buttons but Where's the dislike button Facebook?? I'm pretty sure everyone is/was waiting for tht!

replies.message: Hey Louisa. Thanks for reaching out! Posts on Facebook cover a variety of emotions with updates that are happy, sad, funny, painful, and thought-provoking. We've received feedback that people would like to react to these posts in different ways and Reactions will help people do that. You can share your suggestions with us about Reactions here: http://on.fb.me/1QLKbDZ. Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. -Anna
